channel.title: Homes on Dave Parfitt's blog

item.title: about
item.description:
Biography

I am a software engineer in Buffalo, NY with a focus on backend + distributed systems. I work remotely for Chef Software as a core engineer on Habitat. Previously, I worked at Basho on Riak multi data center replication.

I’m interested in the following languages: Rust, Erlang, D, OCaml, F#, C, Java, Scala, Clojure, Haskell, R.

I’m currently using the following tools: Docker, libsodium, Redis, RabbitMQ, Postgres, Zookeeper, Apache Storm.
